thread.title: BRIEF-B Communications Board Receives Letter From Elliott Advisors UK

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-B Communications Board Receives Letter From Elliott Advisors UK

organizations.name: brief-b communications board receives letter from elliott advisors uk

text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - B Communications Ltd:
* B COMMUNICATIONS LTD SAYS ON FEB 27, COâ€˜S BOARD RECEIVED A LETTER FROM THE COUNSEL OF ELLIOTT ADVISORS (UK) LIMITED - SEC FILING
* B COMMUNICATIONS - ELLIOTT EXPRESSED OPINION THAT CO'S BOARD "MUST REJECT" FEB 25 PROPOSAL FROM CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER FOR APPOINTMENT OF 3 NEW DIRECTORS Source text ( bit.ly/2t1uARN ) Further company coverage:
